bucket4:v1_read.notes: Baseline bucket-4 profile: allow file-read* only.

bucket5:v11_read_subpath.notes: Bucket-5 subpath profile: allow read under /tmp/foo; deny other reads/writes.

runtime:allow_all.notes: allow default; should allow all file read/write

runtime:strict_1.notes: Strict deny-default profile with minimal allow-set for helper liveness.

sys:airlock.notes: Platform-only profile expected to fail apply on this host; preflight is enforced so runners do not attempt apply under a generic harness identity.

sys:bsd.notes: System bsd profile via SBPL (no platform blob entitlements); observed denies on this host.
